title: Simulation-Based Education for Improving Perceptions of Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customized online learning strategy development course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five core metrics (e.g., engagement, technological adaptability) for measuring online learning success.
Learners can apply online collaboration tool strategies in simulation environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze three personal learning barriers and develop improvement plans through VR-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
